text.hint: (+500 exp for each visited object once for each hero)
text.visit: You sit beneath the Dream Teacher, close your eyes, and suddenly find yourself inside a room with bookshelves lining every wall. There are no doors! For what seems like days, a cloaked figure reveals the secrets of those many books. You wake to find only a few seconds have passed!
text.visited: You sit beneath the Dream Teacher but you are unable to fall asleep. Perhaps you have already learned all that it can teach.

text.visit: This grave is fresh, and no one has even had time to take away the shovel that was used to dig it. It will take a whole day of excavation to get to the treasure.
text.visited: This grave is fresh, and no one has even had time to take away the shovel that was used to dig it. Using it and tying a handkerchief around your nose, you extract something valuable from the earth.

text.hint: (Eliminate morale drop due to faction differences until next turn)
text.visit: You pray in an unusual temple and feel how, under the influence of its atmosphere, your army becomes more united.
text.visited: Praying at the Temple of Loyalty helps rally your troops before battle, but your army already acts as a single unit.

text.hint: (+1000 to movement the next day for all of his current stock)
text.visit: A great place to stop and get ready to go on an adventure tomorrow with renewed vigor. Want to camp here?
text.visited: The warriors have already settled down for a rest. It is unlikely that they will be able to get back into action before tomorrow.

text.hint: (+1 to luck until the next battle and +600 to movement for 1 day)
text.visit: The horses are reluctant to drink the brackish water from the spring, but soon you see that the steeds have clearly gained strength. A cheerful rainbow appears in the spray of water above the bubbling spring, which puts your squad in a great mood.
text.visited: The stomachs of people and soldiers gurgle from drinking water. There are enough healing procedures for today.

text.hint: (Upgrade a random secondary skill once per hero)
text.cannotVisit: Entering the shack, you find that the owner of the house is not there, but the walls are covered with pages from scientific books. The manuals are interesting, but difficult - first you will have to read a textbook for beginners somewhere.
text.visit: Entering the shack, you find that the owner of the house is not there, but the walls are covered with pages from scientific books. In the corner near the fireplace, you manage to read something useful.
text.visited: Entering the shack, you discover that no repairs have been made since your last visit, and the walls are still covered with the same familiar manuscripts.

text.hint: (Reduces the cost of a normal step in the wasteland to 75 units until the end of the week)
text.visit: "I know these wastelands like the back of my hand. Even if I haven't been somewhere yet, I'll figure out how to find my way. I can probably go with you for a week if you need a guide," says the inhabitant of this tent.
text.visited: "Hey, this is my tent. Mind you, it's not my fault we're walking in circles," the guide shakes his head.

text.visit: A genie in a soft turban peers out of the lamp. "What, employers again? Do you have money? We don't work for free, we don't grant wishes. Everything else is as it should be".

text.hint: (+2 to vision radius until the end of the week)
text.visit: The astronomer asks you to take his apprentice with you. The young man has been sitting in the tower for too long, and you could use his skills with a telescope. But in a week, the astronomer will be making important observations, and he will need the apprentice himself.
text.visited: The astronomer is not there. There is a note on the observatory door: "I'll be there in a week".

text.visit: The drilling foreman rolls out a cart with valuables. "We sold the mined goods profitably. I hope next time it will be no less - come for your share in a week".
text.visited: The drilling foreman is very busy, and from his grumbling you understand that he has nothing to please you with at the moment. We'll have to stop by next week.

text.visit: The tired prospector looks at you defiantly, but it is clear that he is still afraid of you. For permission to continue mining in this place, he is ready to pay you a small amount regularly.
text.visited: The prospector alternately swears at the exhausted vein, then laments and begs. Apparently, nothing more can be obtained from him this week.

backup.comment: those objects are already present in basic wog version

30.comment: тут количество охраны в стальных големах, которых в игре нет
30.name: Experimental Shop

text.visit: The warehouse keeper announces: "My lord, I have worked hard to provide you with these resources, and come back for the next batch next week".
text.visited: The warehouse owner apologizes: "Unfortunately, Milord, there are no resources at the moment, come back next week".

text.hint: (+2 to magic power or knowledge once per hero)
text.visit: There are exhibition performances at the Colosseum today. You enter the arena and delight the audience with a demonstration of your magical talents. As a prize, you are offered one of the newest teaching aids - a true magician must keep up with the achievements of science.
text.visited: The manager of the Colosseum, recognizing you, bows, but is in no hurry to let you into the arena. "Your place is not among the candidates, but in the judges' box!"

text.hint: (+2000 exp once for each hero for 1000 gold)
text.cannotVisit: An elderly knight emerges from the gazebo. "I will teach you everything I know, it will help you in your travels. However, I will note that a small donation to the League of Knights in Retirement will be required. If you scrape together a thousand coins, come."
text.visit: An elderly knight emerges from the gazebo. "I will teach you everything I know, it will help you in your travels. However, I will note that a small donation to the League of Knights in Retirement will be required. A thousand coins will be enough."
text.visited: A mighty snore can be heard from the gazebo. Apparently, the League has already put your donation to good use.
